title: The Visit
overview: Follows Ansaf's story, which arrives from Cairo to Beirut in 1981, on an unexpected visit to a house. The aim of this visit is to remove the curse of the "Haddad" family and get rid of the evil that controls them and their house. From the moment it arrives, supernatural events occur and are full of terrifying surprises. Later, Ensaf discovers the terrifying secret, that this is the same curse that lost her family.
